issues.title: Tables do not use `<caption>` instead of cells with the `[colspan]` attribute to indicate a caption.
issues.description: Screen readers have features to make navigating tables easier. Ensuring that tables use the actual caption element instead of cells with the `[colspan]` attribute may improve the experience for screen reader users. [Learn more about captions](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/table-fake-caption).

node.nodeLabel: Mean daily temps (C) for Ottawa, Canada Lower Margin Mean Temperature Upper Mar…
node.explanation:
Fix all of the following:
  The first child of the table should be a caption instead of a table cell

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (111.6px by 16px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 18px instead of at least 24px.

automatic.name: Tables; Table Data must have Table Header;

issues.title: `<td>` elements in a large `<table>` do not have table headers.
issues.description: Screen readers have features to make navigating tables easier. Ensuring that `<td>` elements in a large table (3 or more cells in width and height) have an associated table header may improve the experience for screen reader users. [Learn more about table headers](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/td-has-header).

node.nodeLabel: Mean daily temps (C) for Ottawa, Canada Lower Margin Mean Temperature Upper Mar…
node.explanation:
Fix all of the following:
  Some non-empty data cells do not have table headers
